definition: to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: Right now you're holding a parachute from a German flare in your hands.
sentences.chinese: 现在你手里拿的是一个德国照明弹上的降落伞。

sentences.english: Jump out of a plane while still sewing your parachute and you'll get a good sense of pace in this business.
sentences.chinese: 或者说当你还在缝补降落伞的时候就跳出飞机。

sentences.english: The airman bold ly jump from the airplane with his parachute.
sentences.chinese: 飞行员带着降落伞勇敢地跳下飞机。

sentences.english: A mind like a parachute only functions when it is open.
sentences.chinese: 人的头脑就像降落伞，只有张开时才能起作用。

sentences.english: It was released in January after an apparent ransom was parachuted aboard the vessel.
sentences.chinese: 一个月后，在赎金用降落伞投掷到船上后，它被放回。

sentences.english: Today, nylons help make products ranging from dish scrubbers to parachutes.
sentences.chinese: 如今尼龙产品遍及从清洗产品到降落伞等各个领域。

sentences.english: But against the vast expanse of the sky, the chute looked very small.
sentences.chinese: 但和广阔无垠的天空相比，降落伞看起来是沧海一粟。
他们从贮藏处取出降落伞备用。

sentences.english: Ultimately, the company added a parachute as an emergency landing system.
sentences.chinese: 最终，这家公司添加了一个降落伞作为紧急着陆系统。

sentences.english: Airborne troops are hiding their chutes and going to the gathering points.
sentences.chinese: 空降部队正在隐藏他们的降落伞，去集合地。

sentences.english: Minds, like parachutes, function only when open.
sentences.chinese: 心胸，就像是降落伞，只张开时才有用。

sentences.english: Who Is Packing Our Spiritual Parachute?
sentences.chinese: 谁在打包你的灵魂降落伞？

sentences.english: You will be instructed on how to handle the parachute at the gym of the aeroclub.
sentences.chinese: 你将在航空俱乐部的健身房培训如何操作降落伞。

sentences.english: Aeroplanes and parachutes, on the other hand, were foreign.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，飞机与降落伞都不在考虑范围。

sentences.english: My chute didn't open. And you don't land standing up.
sentences.chinese: 我的降落伞就是没打开，而且不可能站着落地。

sentences.english: Each bubble can open a parachute to slow down and avoid deaths.
sentences.chinese: 每个泡泡都可以开启降落伞来减速和避免跌死。

definition: see 直升機|直升机[zhi2 sheng1 ji1]
